functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Last Corridor Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Dying residents of the Psychiatric","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Ward were sent to a happier place","color":"gray"}','{"text":"known as the Last Corridor, where","color":"gray"}','{"text":"they were euthanized and incinerated.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"This practice, combined with the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"oblivious cheeriness of the residents","color":"gray"}','{"text":"is why the Ward was the very last","color":"gray"}','{"text":"place to fall to the reaping.","color":"gray"}']}}
